title: GOOGLE ASSISTANT BUG??
content:
So I just realised today that my Pixel 3s Google Assistant wasn't working, here's my issue:

It acts like my microphone is broken (Not recognizing any noise at all but it's working whenever im recording videos)

It just works if I change the "assistants voice" into another color ask it a question then it'll stop recognizing my voice or there's no sound reaction at all.

I can't retrain my assistant because the microphone doesn't "work" whenever i try to.

I tried rebooting/reinstalling google assistant and the issue still persist..

Any solutions for this?? Thanks!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
